Class BytePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • BytePattern

  • public class BytePattern
extends java.lang.Object
    Models an object which checks the user selected file against each pattern value and prints value in the gui TextArea.
    Author:
    Bishanta

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int file_num
      Stores number of files being scanned.
      int offset
      Stores pattern location within the file which is being scanned.
      boolean pattern
      Stores true for every pattern with a file.
      int pattern_num
      Stores number of pattern inside a file or directory.
      boolean patternFound
      Stores true if atleast one pattern is found within a file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Converts Bytes array into hexadecimal character format.

      Takes path of a directory and scan all the folders and well as sub-folder using recursion.
      void checkFile(java.lang.String filepath)
      Checks the file for each byte against the pattern and displays the pattern that match.
      boolean checkNext(byte value)
      Checks if the given value matches the next byte to be checked within the pattern.

        public int offset
        Stores pattern location within the file which is being scanned.

        public boolean pattern
        Stores true for every pattern with a file.

    • Method Detail

      • checkNext

        public boolean checkNext(byte value)
        Checks if the given value matches the next byte to be checked within the pattern. Each time this method is called it progresses to the next byte within the pattern, until the value does not match or the end of the pattern is reached (in which case a match has been found).
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be checked against the next byte in the pattern.
        Returns:
        true if the pattern has been matched, false if the pattern has not (yet) matched.

      • checkDirectory

        public void checkDirectory(java.lang.String startDir,
                           BytePattern bytepattern)
        Takes path of a directory and scan all the folders and well as sub-folder using recursion. Goes through each folder and directory and calls the method checkFile while again checks all the bytes in that particular files.
        Parameters:
        startDir - path string value of a directory.
        bytepattern - Obj of the bytepattern for accessing it's methods.

      • checkFile

        public void checkFile(java.lang.String filepath)
        Checks the file for each byte against the pattern and displays the pattern that match. Reads each byte of the byte and calls checkNext method on them which checks those bytes against the pattern value.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path of the file as a string.

      • bytesToHex

        public java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)
        Converts Bytes array into hexadecimal character format.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array of pattern
        Returns:
        String of hex characters derived from byte array.
